privacy.title: Your privacy is important to us.
privacy.text: All your images are processed exclusively locally in your browser. No files are uploaded to any server. Your data never leaves your device.

q1.question: How do I add images?
q1.answer: You can simply drag and drop images into the designated area or click the "Select Files" button to upload them from your device.

q2.question: How can I edit a single image?
q2.answer: Click the magic wand button () on an image card. A window will open with all editing options.

q3.question: How do I save the edited images?
q3.answer: Select the desired images by clicking on their cards, then click "Save As…" in the top bar.

q4.question: Which image formats are supported?
q4.answer: The application supports PNG, JPEG, WebP, BMP, and GIF, depending on your browser's capabilities.

q5.question: Can I download multiple images as a ZIP file?
q5.answer: Yes. Select the images and click the "ZIP" button in the toolbar.

q6.question: How do I create a PDF file from my images?
q6.answer: You can export either all images or selected ones as PDF using the respective buttons.

q7.question: What happens if I close the browser window?
q7.answer: All images are stored locally, so they will be lost if you close the window. Save your work regularly.

q8.question: How do I remove images from the list?
q8.answer: Click the red X icon on individual cards or use the "Delete" button for multiple selections.
